_CANINFO Struct Reference
[CAN Devices, CAN Devices]

#include <can_dev.h>

Detailed Description

CAN controller information structure.


Data Fields

HANDLE volatile can_rx_rdy
HANDLE volatile can_tx_rdy
u_long can_rx_frames
u_long can_tx_frames
u_long can_interrupts
u_long can_overruns
u_long can_errors

Field Documentation

HANDLE volatile _CANINFO::can_rx_rdy
 

Receiver event queue.

HANDLE volatile _CANINFO::can_tx_rdy
 

Transmitter event queue.

u_long _CANINFO::can_rx_frames
 

Number of packets received.

u_long _CANINFO::can_tx_frames
 

Number of packets sent.

u_long _CANINFO::can_interrupts
 

Number of interrupts.

u_long _CANINFO::can_overruns
 

Number of packet overruns.

u_long _CANINFO::can_errors
 

Number of frame errors.
